channel.title: Turning character around, set screen and make them not turn the screen [Delta]
channel.description:
[s]I'm wondering how to point a character a special way, (i.e the face points north, south, etc)[/s] And how to point their screen to north and make it so they can't turn the screen.
I'm using Delta as stated in the title :)
Alright, I found out how to point the character, now I just need to know how to lock the screen to north.

item.title: Turning character around, set screen and make them not turn the screen [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:4, topic:441251”][quote author=RemiM link=topic=543942.msg3987265#msg3987265 date=1336074092]

I’m wondering how to point a character a special way, (i.e the face points north, south, etc)
And how to point their screen to north and make it so they can’t turn the screen.

I’m using Delta as stated in the title

Alright, I found out how to point the character, now I just need to know how to lock the screen to north.

Decompile moparscape’s client, it has a maplock. Take a look at the piece of code.

Alright, thx
[/quote]

If you can’t find it, I’ll look into it. Just let me know :P[/quote]Now you’re gonna do it for him…

Read full topic
